import axios from"axios";export default{// Get books from Google Books api
getGoogleSearchBooks:function getGoogleSearchBooks(queryString){return axios.get("https://www.googleapis.com/books/v1/volumes?q="+queryString);},// Get all books
getBooks:function getBooks(){return axios.get("/api/books");},// Get books with an id
getBook:function getBook(id){return axios.get("/api/books/"+id);},// Save a book
saveBook:function saveBook(savedBooks){return axios.post("/api/books",savedBooks);},// Delete a book from id
deleteBook:function deleteBook(id){return axios.delete("/api/books/"+id);}};
